ARABIC: وَقَالَ ٱللَّهُ لَا تَتَّخِذُوٓا۟ إِلَٰهَيْنِ ٱثْنَيْنِ إِنَّمَا هُوَ إِلَٰهٌ وَٰحِدٌ فَإِيَّٰىَ فَٱرْهَبُونِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Allah says, 'Do not take two gods. He is only One God. So dread Me alone.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: God says: "Do not take to two gods, for there is only one God. So fear Me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Allah has commanded: "Do not take two gods; for He is but One God. So fear Me alone."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: God says, "Do not worship two gods. There is only One God. Have fear of Me".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And Allah has proclaimed, “Do not ascribe two Gods; indeed He is the only One God; therefore fear Me alone.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And Allah said "Do not worship two gods. Indeed, He (Allah) is only One God. Then fear Me Alone.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And Allah has said: Take not two gods, He is only one Allah; so of Me alone should you be afraid.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: God says: 'Take not to you two gods. He is only One God; so have awe of Me.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Allah hath said: Choose not two gods. There is only One Allah. So of Me, Me only, be in awe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: God says, "Do not take two gods. He is only One God. So fear Me alone."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And Allah hath said: take not two gods; He is only One God so Me alone, Me dread.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Allah has said, ‘Do not worship two gods. Indeed He is the One God, so be in awe of Me [alone].’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Allah has said: "Take not (for worship) two gods: for He is just One Allah: then fear Me (and Me alone)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And Allah said (O mankind!): "Take not ilahain (two gods in worship, etc.). Verily, He (Allah) is (the) only One Ilah (God). Then, fear Me (Allah) much [and Me (Alone), i.e. be away from all kinds of sins and evil deeds that Allah has forbidden and do all that Allah has ordained and worship none but Allah].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Allah says: 'Do not take to yourself two gods. He is only One God; so have awe of Me'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: God has said: “Do not take two gods; He is only One God; so fear only Me.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And Allah has said, "Do not take for yourselves two deities. He is but one God, so fear only Me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [16:51] And God has said: ‘Do not choose two gods (ithnayn is for emphasis). Truly there is only One God — He has added this [statement] to affirm [His] Divinity and Oneness — so be in awe of Me [alone]’: fear Me, to the exclusion of anyone else — herein is a shift from the third person [to the first].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Allah hath said: Choose not) worship not (two gods) i.e. Himself as well as the idols. (There is only One God) without a son or partner. (So of Me, Me only, be in awe) fear Me in relation to worshipping idols.
